result.ga: an bhfuil cead agam caitheamh anseo
result.orig: an bhfuil cead agam caitheamh anseo
result.html: an bhfuil cead agam caitheamh anseoMay I smoke here?
result.ponchtml: an ḃfuil cead agam caiṫeaṁ anseoMay I smoke here?

result.html: an gcaitheann tú tobacDo you smoke?
result.ponchtml: an gcaiṫeann tú tobacDo you smoke?

result.html: ní chaitheann sise toitíníShe does not smoke.
result.ponchtml: ní ċaiṫeann sise toitíníShe does not smoke.

result.eng: The room is full of smoke.
result.ga: tá an seomra lán de dheatach
result.orig: tá an seomra lán de dheatach
result.html: tá an seomra lán de dheatachThe room is full of smoke.
result.ponchtml: tá an seomra lán de ḋeataċThe room is full of smoke.

result.eng: It is illegal to smoke here.
result.ga: tá sé mídhleathach tobac a chaitheamh anseo
result.orig: tá sé mídhleathach tobac a chaitheamh anseo
result.html: tá sé mídhleathach tobac a chaitheamh anseoIt is illegal to smoke here.
result.ponchtml: tá sé míḋleaṫaċ tobac a ċaiṫeaṁ anseoIt is illegal to smoke here.

result.ga: tá tú chomh dubh le deatach
result.orig: tá tú chomh dubh le deatach
result.html: tá tú chomh dubh le deatachYou're as black as smoke.
result.ponchtml: tá tú ċoṁ duḃ le deataċYou're as black as smoke.

result.eng: Why was smoke coming from both sides of the building?
result.ga: cén fáth an raibh deatach ag teacht ó dhá thaobh an fhoirgnimh
result.orig: cén fáth an raibh deatach ag teacht ó dhá thaobh an fhoirgnimh
result.html: cén fáth an raibh deatach ag teacht ó dhá thaobh an fhoirgnimhWhy was smoke coming from both sides of the building?
result.ponchtml: cén fáṫ an raiḃ deataċ ag teaċt ó ḋá ṫaoḃ an ḟoirgniṁWhy was smoke coming from both sides of the building?

result.eng: Tall black chimneys spewing smoke into the sky.
result.ga: simléirí arda dubha ag teilgean toite sa spéir
result.orig: simléirí arda dubha ag teilgean toite sa spéir
result.html: simléirí arda dubha ag teilgean toite sa spéirTall black chimneys spewing smoke into the sky.
result.ponchtml: simléirí arda duḃa ag teilgean toite sa spéirTall black chimneys spewing smoke into the sky.
